title: Downpayment
des: I require a $50 downpayment for every photoshoot, to be paid at least a week in advance. It is customary, in case of cancellation. Remember, time is money, and this is a job not a hobby!

title: Portrait
des: An hour and a half portrait session. This could mean graduation, or just for the fun of it! I love coming up with new creative concepts to try out, I am always willing to try new ideas.

title: Wedding
des: Prices usually start at $2,000 for a full wedding, and you will get 500 fully edited photos. Depending on the length and amount of photos wanted, prices may vary. Email me for more details!

title: Elopement
des: Two hours with your choice of location. Weddings not your thing? An elopment photoshoot is the perfect way to celebrate! Elopement photoshoots can get very creative, and each is unique. Message me for ideas!

title: Couples
des: Valentines Day, Christmas, or just for the heck of it? Me, you, and your significant other for two hours. Typically come with 20 fully edited photos, as well as digital copies.

title: Babies
des: Why not book one hour for me and your little one? They grow up fast, so capture their first moments forever. One hour, twenty fully edited photos.
